page.title: 05Buildings
page.content:
There are many buildings at Grove Farm.They are used in several ways and they are built in different materials and styles. { {The Farmhouse}
The house is over a hundred years old.It is made of brick covered with roughcast and painted white.It has three triangular rooves.There is a garden with lawns,roses ,fruit trees and a vegetable garden at the rear. { {The Hay Barn } { The hay barn on Mrs Price's farm is one hundred years old. It is crippled on its front right leg. The roof was made corrugated tin. It was open on all sides and it was about 5m tall and it is used for storing hay.
